title: Are you claiming the unused IHT allowance ('nil-rate band') of the deceased's late spouse or civil partner?
question: Are you claiming the unused IHT allowance ('nil-rate band') of the deceased's late spouse or civil partner?
hint: The spouse or civil partner must have died before the deceased to claim any unused nil-rate band allowance.

unusedAllowanceClaimed.required: Answer ‘yes’ if you are claiming the unused IHT allowance ('nil-rate band') of the deceased's late spouse or civil partner
